Reading List

  • A list of book I've read (or re-read) since 2019. Before then I didn't really keep track
  • Recommended books have a star ★
  • Based on this blog post by Chuck Grimmett
Last updated January 14, 2020

2020

3 books
  • Across the Nightingale Floor by Lian Hearn
  • Factfulness by Hans Rosling★
  • Salvation Lost by Peter F Hamilton

2019

20 books
  • Jonathan Strange & Mr Norrell by Susanna Clarke
  • Range by David Epstein★
  • Salvation by Peter F Hamilton
  • The Man Who Mistook His Wife for a Hat by Oliver Sacks
  • The Aleph (and other stories) by Jorge Luis Borges★
  • The First Fifteen Lives of Harry August by Claire North
  • The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle by Haruki Murakami
  • The Score Takes Care of Itself by Bill Walsh
  • Boyd by Robert Coram★
  • The Confidence Trap by David Runciman
  • A Gentleman in Moscow by Amor Towles★
  • The Player of Games by Iain M Banks★
  • The Wise Man's Fear by Patrick Rothfuss
  • The Name of the Wind by Patrick Rothfuss
  • Business Adventures by John Brooks
  • A Night Without Stars by Peter F Hamilton
  • The Abyss Beyond Dreams by Peter F Hamilton
  • Tinker Taylor Soldier Spy by John Le Carre
  • String Theory by David Foster Wallace★
  • The Sirens of Titan by Kurt Vonnegut
